original_title: Cricket in the '70s: Australia v England 1974-75 Test Series (1st, 2nd and 3rd Tests)
overview: 1st Test - Brisbane (November 29th - December 4th 1974)  2nd Test - Perth (December 13th - 17th 1974)  3rd Test - Melbourne (December 26th - 31st 1974)
